statement.name: findRandomTracks
statement.sql: SELECT {trackColumns}, COUNT(i.track_id) AS imagecount FROM track t LEFT OUTER JOIN image i ON i.track_id = t.id GROUP BY {groupByTrackColumns} ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT :maxCount

statement.name: findAlbumImage
statement.sql: SELECT data AS data FROM image i, track t WHERE t.album = :album AND i.track_id = t.id AND i.size = :size LIMIT 1

statement.name: nextPlaylistId
statement.sql: DELETE FROM playlist_id_sequence WHERE id = LAST_INSERT_ID()
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS id FROM playlist_id_sequence LIMIT 1
